text: (inka ila annadu): "Vastavanga allah maku (mi dharmam nundi) vimukti kaligincina taruvata kuda memu tirigi mi dharmanloki cerite! Memu allah pai abad'dham kalpincina varamavutamu. Ma prabhuvaina allah korite tappa! Memu tirigi danilo ceralemu. Ma prabhuvu jnanam prati vastuvunu avarinci undi. Memu allah painane adharapadi unnamu. 'O ma prabhu! Ma madhya mariyu ma jativari madhya n'yayanga tirpu ceyi. Mariyu nive atyuttamamaina tirpu cesevadavu
